inputs.sentence: I left the house at 6 a.m.
Labor day is on September 6th this year.

outputs.sentence: Labor day is on 6th September this year.

inputs.sentence: She got home from work at 1700.

outputs.sentence: She got home from work at 5 p.m.

inputs.sentence: In the Northern Hemisphere, the winter solstice is on Dec. 21 this year.
